job.title: IT Quality Assurance Analyst III (SAP)
job.description: CHS Inc is a leading global agribusiness owned by farmers ranchers and cooperatives across the United States that provides grain food and energy resources to businesses and consumers around the world We serve agriculture customers and consumers across the United States and around the world Most of our 10000 employees are in the United States but today we have employees in 19 countries At CHS we are creating connections to empower agriculturebrbrstronguSummarybrbrustrongstrongCHSstrong has an exciting opportunity in our Information Technology group We are looking for an strongIT Quality Assurance Analyst III SAP strongto join our growing team The IT Quality Assurance Analyst III SAP upholds and continually improves CHSs IT Quality Assurance and Testing standards and processes This position validates enterprise applications and systems in support of CHS business operations The IT Quality Assurance Analyst III SAP ensures QA and Testing activities and deliverables are completed ontime and onbudget This position is expected to leverage test automation to boost efficiency across products This position also assists the IT Quality Assurance Analyst IV and IT QA Manager in supervisory role in the QA teambrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliComplete review and provide feedback to standardize QA and Testing artifacts test plans cases evidence scripts data metrics and audit created to validate the application developed or being implemented from a vendor conforms to the requirements design and intended production implementationliliWork with teams to implement Test Automation frameworkliliWork with QA staff and product teams comply and help drive improvements applicable Software Development Lifecycle and Testing Processes as it relates to the CHS QA Center of ExcellenceliliEstablish cadence for meeting with staff for 11sliliWork with resource firms to recruit interview and onboard contract resources to help with staff augmentation for product teamsliliIdentify document triage and track issues found during test executionliliEscalate risks that will directly impact project timelines and deliverablesliliFollow all company safety policies procedures and regulationsbrliulstronguMinimum Qualifications requiredustrongulliBachelors Degree or higher in Computer Science Information Systems or related field or equivalent years of training work experience and educationlili4 years of experience in IT QA and Testing to includeliulliSAP FTM or DTS module experienceliliAnalysis of requirements and designliliTransition of test requirements and test cases and execution of testsliliReporting and mediation of defects and progress reporting liulli2 years of test automation experience execution and revising existing scriptsbrliulstronguAdditional Qualificationsustrongulli5 years of software QA and testing experiencelili2 years of experience in SAP FTM or DTS moduleslili1 years of supervisory experienceliliQA or Testing Professional Certification includingliulliCertified Software Test Professional CSTPliliCSTE Certified Software Test EngineerliliCertified Test Manager CTMliulliLEAN CertificationliliCertified Scrum Master CSMliliExperience in SAP ECC or S4 HANA developmentdeployment or support capacityliliExperience creating executive summaries or root cause analysis for communication at all levelsliliExperience in creating test automation from a defined manual test casebrliulCHS offers a competitive total compensation package Benefits include Health Dental Vision Hearing Life Insurance Health and Day Care Savings Accounts Paid Vacation 401K Company Funded Pension Profit Sharing Long and Short Term Disability Tuition reimbursement and Adoption assistancebrbrCHS is an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrEffective January 6 2020 the US Department of Transportation Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration FMCSA requires employers to conduct a preemployment verification full query against the newly established License Drug and Alcohol Clearinghouse prior to beginning employment in a position that requires a valid commercial drivers license CDL Candidates seeking employment in a position that requires a commercial motor vehicle license must voluntarily enter their information into the FMCSA and must provide disclosure authorization at the time of offer to CHS or an authorized thirdparty agent of CHS to verify the information
